history.proof: unfold Cmod. qsimpl use: Rsqr_0. qsimpl use: Rsqr_0. hauto use: Rmult_0_l, Rplus_0_r, Rsqr_sqrt, Rplus_le_le_0_compat, Rsqr_0_uniq, Rle_0_sqr unfold: Rsqr.
